function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of COVID-19 among construction workers","Impact":"Increased risk of illness, workforce disruption, and potential spread to other stakeholders","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety protocols, provide vaccinations, and promote remote work where possible","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, temperature scanning devices, and remote collaboration tools","People":"Construction workers, project managers, and site supervisors","Owner":"Construction companies, project owners, and government health agencies"},{"Description":"Limited knowledge about the influence of vaccination campaigns","Impact":"Uncertainty about the effectiveness of vaccination in reducing the impacts of COVID-19 on construction projects","Mitigation":"Conduct research to assess the impact of vaccination on construction workers, gather data on vaccination rates, and promote vaccination campaigns","Technologies":"Data collection tools, survey platforms, and vaccination tracking systems","People":"Construction workers, researchers, and public health agencies","Owner":"Research organizations, public health agencies, and construction companies"},{"Description":"Lack of effective strategies to mitigate the impacts of COVID-19 on the construction sector","Impact":"Continued disruptions, financial losses, and prolonged recovery of the construction industry","Mitigation":"Develop and implement comprehensive risk management plans, support research into innovative mitigation strategies, and collaborate with public health authorities","Technologies":"Risk assessment software, data analytics tools, and digital collaboration platforms","People":"Construction industry leaders, policymakers, and public health experts","Owner":"Construction industry associations, government agencies, and research institutions"}]}
